targets.expr:
sum(
  (1 - sum without (mode) (rate(node_cpu_seconds_total{job="node-exporter", mode=~"idle|iowait|steal", instance=~"^($instance)$"}[$__rate_interval])))
/ ignoring(cpu) group_left
  count without (cpu, mode) (node_cpu_seconds_total{job="node-exporter", mode="idle", instance=~"^($instance)$"})
) by (instance)

panels.description:
Total number of queue master replicas per node. 

This metric makes it easy to see sub-optimal queue distribution in a cluster.

* [Queue Masters, Data Locality](https://www.rabbitmq.com/ha.html#master-migration-data-locality)
* [Queues](https://www.rabbitmq.com/queues.html)
panels.title: Total queues

panels.description:
Total number of consumers master replicas per node. 

This metric makes it easy to see sub-optimal queue distribution in a cluster.

* [Queue Masters, Data Locality](https://www.rabbitmq.com/ha.html#master-migration-data-locality)
* [Queues](https://www.rabbitmq.com/queues.html)
panels.title: Total consumers

targets.expr:
sum(mongodb_mongod_metrics_cursor_open{} or
mongodb_mongod_cursors{} or
mongodb_mongos_metrics_cursor_open{} or 
mongodb_mongos_cursors{})

panels.description:
The breakdown of the various HTTP status codes of the requests handled within' this period that matches the variables chosen above.

This chart helps notice and dive into which service is having failures and of what kind.
panels.title: HTTP Rate

panels.description:
The breakdown of the various HTTP status codes of the requests handled within' this period that matches the variables chosen above.

This chart helps notice and dive into which service is having failures and of what kind.
panels.title: HTTP Error

panels.description:
The breakdown of the various HTTP status codes of the requests handled within' this period that matches the variables chosen above.

This chart helps notice and dive into which service is having failures and of what kind.
panels.title: HTTP Delay

targets.expr: sum(irate(response_total{classification="success", namespace="$namespace", deployment="$deployment", direction="inbound"}[$__rate_interval])) by (deployment) / sum(irate(response_total{namespace="$namespace", deployment="$deployment", direction="inbound"}[$__rate_interval])) by (deployment)
sum(count_over_time({container="event-exporter"} |= "Marking for deletion Pod" | json | __error__=`` | metadata_namespace=~`$namespace` | reason="TaintManagerEviction" [$__interval]))

panels.title: Для отображения метрик включите параметры мониторинга в ELMA365 enterprise: https://elma365.com/ru/help/platform/elma365-overview-dashboard.html

options.content:
# Disclamer Для отображения метрик включите параметры мониторинга в ELMA365 enterprise
Подробнее: https://elma365.com/ru/help/platform/elma365-overview-dashboard.html
